tnc.whoEligible: Who is eligible to join the Uspin33 Mini Game?
tnc.whoEligible.1: All Uwin33 members are entitled to participate in the "Uspin33 Mini Game" and win cash prizes starting from {{startDate}}, at 00:00:00 until {{endDate}}, at 23:59:59 ({{timeZone}}).
tnc.howToParticipate.1: Make a single deposit of minimum {{minDeposit}} to earn {{token}} ({{tokenNo}}) ticket to play the mini game per day.
tnc.howToParticipate.2: Accumulate a total deposit of {{accumulateDeposit}} to earn an extra ticket within the same day. (A maximum of {{maxToken}} ({{maxTokenNo}}) tickets can be obtained per day)
tnc.howToParticipate.3: Daily Mission reset at 12:00AM every day, you may make your deposit to obtain available tickets again.
tnc.howToPlay: How to play the Uspin33 Mini Game?
tnc.howToPlay.1: Once you've received a ticket, click on the spin button in the middle of the wheel to play the mini game.
tnc.howToPlay.2: Join the mini game using your available tickets.
tnc.howToPlay.3: Tickets will expire on {{endDate}}, at 23:59:59. Members must use all available tickets to spin the wheel before the end date.
tnc.howToRedeem.1: All winning prizes will be credited automatically to the member's account wallet.
tnc.howToWithdraw.1: Members are required to fulfill a minimum one (x1) times of real bet based on bonus amount before withdrawal. Example:
tnc.howToWithdraw.2: All products are available to play with the claimed bonus. The following are excluded from the Turnover/Real Bet calculation:
tnc.howToWithdraw.2.excluded:
• Draw Results
  • Betting Both Sides
  • Voided/Canceled Games
  • Bet 24 numbers or above within ONE (1) round/match in Roulette games
  • Bet placed Containing selection of odds less than 0.5 or 1.50 (Decimal Odds)
  • 3 Pictures, Casino Hold'em, Poker Games
  • RNG/Arcade Games
  • 4D Lottery
tnc.reservedRights: UWIN33 RESERVES THE RIGHT TO MODIFY THE EVENT TERMS OR CANCEL THIS EVENT AT ANY TIME, EITHER AIMING AT ALL PLAYERS OR INDIVIDUAL PLAYERS.UWIN33 RESERVED THE RIGHTS TO MODIFY.
tnc.allTcApply: ALL UWIN33 GENERAL TERMS & CONDITIONS APPLY.

supremeTnc:
How to Participate?

  • All Uwin33 members are entitled to purchase up to two (2) tickets per day, regardless of the spin tier (Bronze, Silver, Gold) they choose.
  • Members earn 1 point for every {{currency}} {{depositAmountPerPoint}} deposited. (Example: total deposit {{currency}} {{depositAmountPerPointx100}} = 100 Points).
  • Points are used to redeem tickets for the mini game.
  • Points reset daily at 12:00AM ({{timeZone}}). Please use your points before the daily reset.

Ticket Purchase Requirements by Tier:

  • First Ticket:
    1. Bronze: {{ft0}} points
    2. Silver: {{ft1}} points
    3. Gold: {{ft2}} points
  • Second Ticket:
    1. Bronze: {{st0}} points
    2. Silver: {{st1}} points
    3. Gold: {{st2}} points

How to Play the Uspin33 Mini Game?

  • After redeeming a ticket using your points, click the Spin Now button at the center of the wheel to play.
  • Each ticket corresponds to the selected wheel tier (Bronze, Silver, or Gold).
  • Tickets must be used before {{endTime}} ({{timeZone}}).

Amazing Prizes you might win

    {{physicalPrizeList}}

How to Redeem Your Prizes?

  • All cash prizes will be automatically credited to the memberâ€™s wallet.
  • For physical prizes, please contact LiveChat. Our Customer Service Team will assist you in collecting your shipping details.

How to Withdraw?

  • Members must complete a 1x turnover (real bet) of the prize amount before a withdrawal can be made.
    Example:
    1. Prize Amount = {{currency}} 1,888
    2. Required Bet = {{currency}} 1,888 x 1 = {{currency}} 1,888

Turnover Exclusions

  • All products are available for play using the claimed bonus. However, the following are excluded from turnover calculation:
    1. Draw results
    2. Betting on both sides
    3. Voided or canceled games
    4. Betting 24 numbers or more within ONE (1) round/match in Roulette games
    5. Bets placed that include any selection with odds less than 0.5 or 1.50 (Decimal odds)
    6. 3 Pictures, Casino Hold'em, and Poker Games
    7. RNG/Arcade Games
    8. 4D Lottery
supremeTncMega888: • Mega888 Non-Slots Games including Arcade, Fishing, Table Card Games (Electronic & Live Casino) are not allowed to play with this bonus claimed. Once found, winning amount will be forfeited.
